entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:13 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
